column2: A collection of key metrics maintained by Our World in Data - updated regularly and includes data on CO2 emissions, other greenhouse gases, energy mix, and other relevant metrics.
The dataset allows for comparisons of various countries and regions in relation to overall emission trends along with their sources
emissions, CO2, CO2 share, N2O, CH4
This data has been collected, aggregated, and documented by Hannah Ritchie, Max Roser, Edouard Mathieu, Bobbie Macdonald and Pablo Rosado.

column5: Description
The year of the emission report
The name of a country
Abbreviation of country
A countries gross domestic product for a given year
A countries population for a given year
The total amount of CH4 produced (kilotons)
The total amount of N2O produced (kilotons)
The total amount of CO2 produced (kilotons) related to the cement production
The total amount of CO2 produced (kilotons) related to the coal industry
The total amount of CO2 produced (kilotons) related to gas consumption
The total amount of CO2 produced (kilotons) related to oil consumption
The total amount of CO2 produced (kilotons) related to flaring
The total amount of CO2 produced (kilotons) related to flaring other areas (such that CO2 total is sum of components)
The total amount of CO2 produced (kilotons)
The share of global CO2 produced (kilotons) related to the cement production
The share of global CO2 produced (kilotons) related to the coal industry
The share of global CO2 produced (kilotons) related to gas consumption
The share of global CO2 produced (kilotons) related to oil consumption
The share of global CO2 produced (kilotons) related to flaring
The share of global CO2 produced (kilotons)
